name: Nonrandom: Card Game
description:
Core concept of rock, paper and scissors spiced up with card game mechanics.

Only playable (and best) with a friend.

=================Warning ================= You have to stay on this page while playing.  Web browsers throttle unfocused tabs which may cause fatal bug with networking (message from one player doesn't arrive to the other) =================

Controls:

Mouse

I - Toggle info labels

M - Mute/Unmute music
